attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With regards to the recent publicity regarding second homes for MP's, we propose that a certain number of newly built apartment blocks are bought by the government to house MP's whilst in session. This will ensure that existing homes will always be available regardless of any election results and cut down on extra expenditure resulting in claims for 'second homes' for the tax payer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
